title: Megan Gale reveals why she has no plans to expand her family with partner Shaun Hampson
text:
She's the model and actress who juggles motherhood with business.

And Megan Gale, 44, has revealed she has no plans of expanding her young family with partner Shaun Hampson, 31, just yet.

The mother-of-two told 7News on Friday: 'I don't want to rush and have a third child because of my age.'

'I don't want to rush and have a third child': Model, mother and skin care entrepreneur Megan Gale revealed she has no plans to expand her young family with partner Shaun Hampson, 31, because of her age

She also explained that she is focussed on her two children River, five, and Rosie, two, as well as her thriving baby skin care business Mindful.

'It’s kind of like a rebirth, which is really exciting for me,' she said of her new role as an entrepreneur.

Her skin care line produces nappy cream, balm, massage oil, hair and body wash, as well as lotion.

Family and business: She also explained that she is focused on their two children River, five, and Rosie, two, (pictured with Shaun) as well as her thriving baby skin care business Mindful

Megan met the retired AFL star back in early 2011 and their relationship made headlines because of their 13-year age gap.

In the interview, she credited her beau, who appeared on the last season of Australian Survivor, with supporting her and her business.

'I call him my IT support,' she joked, 'He’s also very good with a spreadsheet and finances and has a good head for business too.'

'I call him my IT support': Megan credited her beau with supporting her and helping with Mindful - particularly with computer related issue. She added, 'he’s also very good with a spreadsheet and finances and has a good head for business too'

In 2014, the couple welcomed their first son River, followed by Rosie three years later.

Megan launched her modelling career in the late '90s, when she appeared in a series of raunchy commercials for Italian telecommunications company Omnitel.

Aside from modelling, she is also known for her modest acting career with parts on Australian films The Water Diviner and Mad Max: Fury Road.
description: She's the model and actress who juggles motherhood with her business.
authors: Alisha Buaya For Daily Mail Australia
